wikipedia_page.main: John Patrick Connolly (born 29 August 1950) is an English businessman. He is the Chairman of Interpath Advisory, Slater & Gordon Group, Stonehage Fleming and Metric Capital Partners. He was Chairman of two FTSE-100 companies, G4S and Amec Foster Wheeler. Prior to that he was senior partner and chief executive of Deloitte in the UK and also global managing partner and global chairman until his retirement in June 2011.

response: *John P. Connolly (businessman) (born 1950), British Chairman of Deloitte
* John P. Connolly – Senior Partner, Chief Executive of Deloitte UK
